original_text: and burned fragrant incense on it, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그 위에 향기로운 향을 사르니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 되니라

sentences.original_text: and burned fragrant incense on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 위에 향기로운 향을 피웠다

sentences.original_text: as the Lord had commanded Moses.
